Contents of text block. Supports markdow: I worked on statistical methods to rank laundry detergents, to find important substructures in pharmacological molecules, and to plan microbiome studies. I designed clinical trials and built prognostic models for the risk of relapse in lymphoma.

I have worked as a research assistant, PhD candidate, clinical trialist, statistical scientist. I like any project that allows me to learn something new, especially from the scientific side. I'm curious about physics, biology, and technology.
I love teaching and presenting results in general. Explaining complex topics is something I really enjoy because you can learn a lot by engaging the audience.
